name: Stegcrawler
short_description:
A web crawler to search the Internet for use of steganography. Includes a MySQL database, and a Java based application to search for, test, and attempt to crack images that (may) use steganography.

Created by the CIST 1450: Object Orientated Programming class at the University of Pittsburgh at Bradford. Class participants were:

Josiah Bennett
Dan Connor	
Lincoln Dorward
Samuel Ficorilli
Samuel Kleiner
Bryan Nelson
Rachel Rybicki
Mark Saccucci
Adam Schrot	
Daniel Taylor	
Steven Trumbull
Aaron Weise

Learn more here: http://coursecast.upb.pitt.edu/Panopto/Pages/Viewer/Default.aspx?id=5ce7f363-bd61-4363-9c7f-c16a3cb9f4bc
summary: A web crawler to search the Internet for use of steganography
